snippet: Jeffrey Ross, a veteran performer at Comedy Central's celebrity roasts, discusses the cable channel's decision not to broadcast jokes he told at a tribute to Roseanne Barr that invoked the deadly shootings at a movie theater in Aurora, Colo.
abstract: Jeffrey Ross, a veteran performer at Comedy Central's celebrity roasts, discusses the cable channel's decision not to broadcast jokes he told at a tribute to Roseanne Barr that invoked the deadly shootings at a movie theater in Aurora, Colo.

headline.main: Comedian Explains His Act After Comedy Central Cuts Jokes on Colorado Shootings
